NPC.name: great serpent
NPC.description: A serpentine creature that must be at least 40 feet long from its tapering jaws all the way to the flare of long fur around its tailtip. Its body is crested along its entire length with long fur and its colour is the hue of a leaden grey sky. The rest of its body is covered in smooth near black charcoal hued hide. Beneath its two pairs of small birdlike or lizardlike legs grip the ground, they hardly seem to be any use for walking at that size but do help to stabilize that slender form. As you regard the thing it inevitably regards you in turn, forked tongue flicking out past stubby teeth as its radiant blue eyes meet yours and you feel your mind waiver.

the great serpent beguiles TARGET removing VALUE points of their resolve
